hydra

Interface Flows


  • public interface Flows
    A collection of convenience methods for constructing and composing flows, or stateful computations.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Trace EMPTY_TRACE

        static <S,A> Flow<S,java.util.List<A>> sequence(java.util.List<Flow<S,A>> elements)
        Evaluate each flow from left to right, and produce a flow of the resulting list. Analogous to the sequence function in Haskell.

      • unexpected

        static <S,A> Flow<S,A> unexpected(java.lang.String cat,
                                  java.lang.Object obj)
        Produce an error flow indicating an unexpected value. For example, if you expect a string but find an integer, use unexpected("string", myInt).
